game.brief:
Batman: Arkham Knight is an action-adventure game developed by Rocksteady Studios, released in 2015. It is the final installment in the Arkham series. Players control Batman as he faces Scarecrow, who unites Gotham's criminals to destroy the Dark Knight. The mysterious Arkham Knight, a new adversary, aids Scarecrow in his plan.

The game features open-world exploration, stealth, combat, and puzzle-solving. A key addition is the Batmobile, used for traversal and combat. The story explores Batman’s psychological struggles and the collapse of his alliances as Gotham spirals into chaos.

In the explosive finale to the Arkham series, Batman faces the ultimate threat against the city he is sworn to protect. The Scarecrow returns to unite an impressive roster of supervillains, including Penguin, Two-Face, Harley Quinn, Firefly, Poison Ivy, and Riddler to destroy The Dark Knight forever. The most intriguing member of this alliance, however, is the deadly and enigmatic Arkham Knight.

game.title: Broforce
game.description: When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force. Brace your loins with up to four players to run ‘n’ gun as dozens of different bros and eliminate the opposing terrorist forces that threaten our way of life. Unleash scores of unique weapons and set off incredible chain reactions of fire, napalm, and limbs in the name of freedom.

localized_description.text: When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force. Brace your loins with up to four players to run ‘n’ gun as dozens of different bros and eliminate the opposing terrorist forces that threaten our way of life. Unleash scores of unique weapons and set off incredible chain reactions of fire, napalm, and limbs in the name of freedom.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 《Broforce Forever》是2015年度最佳爱国游戏众所期待的免费更新，曾因莫须有罪名而无法投入热爱自由的玩家手中，现在则准时突破最高戒备的封锁，准备以大量肯塔基炸鸡式的腥风血雨迎战邪恶势力。
 
 本次最终更新将战役体验加以强化扩充，并加入新解锁内容、六位新登场的终极爱国兄弟、四个传播民主的新挑战关卡，还有军事力量的究极展现：修复错误！
 
 回归玩家享受本更新的最佳方式是重新玩一遍战役，然后再玩一遍，玩到天荒地老。 新兄弟报到 驾驭Seth Brondle（赛夫·搏朗斗）充满算计的高智商以及会吐酸的魅力，挥舞Xebro（锡搏）的飞空环刃，跟着弹奏动人音乐的扰乱分子Desperabro（亡命兄弟）用榴弹让恐怖主义长眠，或是成为怪物的恶梦：投掷木桩、净化不洁存在、自我复活的青少年Slayer（杀手）！
 
 如果狙击比较符合你的风格，知名的昆虫猎人Burt Brommer（勃尔特·勃罗默）能用可靠的步枪准确解放目标，Demolition Bro（爆破兄弟）的冰冻榴弹则能把恶人送回他们该去的地方，加以冰封。 新坏蛋登场 面对企图破坏自由的恶人时，兄弟才会成为战力。《Broforce Forever》的恐怖分子如今更加坚定，决心要摧毁民主体制。Motorbike Maniacs（摩托车狂徒）会想尽办法撞倒玩家，定点机枪、带刺铁丝、沙包、满载火箭弹的飞船则会彼此合作，让兄弟们每次前往占领地区出任务变得异常艰难。 新挑战降临 想找更大型战役的兄弟可以进入Muscle Temples（肌肉神殿），在这些新的挑战关卡中秀秀肌肉。每场战役中，各位印第安纳兄斯都必须闯过危险的神殿，克服新的威胁度、特定类型的敌人、各种危险。成功后即可解锁四项秀肌肉新能力的其中一种，让任何兄弟随时随地使用，就像行使自由一样。
 
  关于游戏 当邪恶威胁世界时,世界就会呼唤 Broforce,-一个资金不足但能力过硬、专门处理极端组织的准军事组织。 挺直腰板,与其他几十个兄弟一样奔跑、开火,消灭威胁到我们生活方式的恐怖主义。 释放数十种独特的武器,以自由之名掀起一系列对于火、烧夷弹、肢体等不可思议的连锁反应。 主要特色   兄贵力量：与其他几十个拥有特殊武器和独特攻击技巧的兄弟一样让世界感到对你的震惊和敬畏，在世界各地传播自由的福音。
   兄贵合作&死亡竞赛：在合作模式中与多达四位玩家一起对抗恐怖主义，或是断绝兄贵关系，在多种夸张的竞争模式中相互对峙。
   加入其他兄贵，在地区爆炸和大规模混乱的压力下穿越这些限时独特的攻击关卡。
   可破坏的地形提供了一系列战略选项，而正义爆炸红桶™简直可以一击扫清战场。
   运用强大的关卡编辑器，设计你自己的毁灭乐园，分享到网上成为其他兄贵嫉妒的焦点。浏览数十个用户创建的关卡，完成这些关卡并评估它们的兄贵力。

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 《Broforce Forever》是2015年度最佳愛國遊戲眾所期待的免費更新，曾因莫須有罪名而無法投入熱愛自由的玩家手中，現在則準時突破最高戒備的封鎖，準備以大量肯塔基酥炸式腥風血雨迎戰邪惡勢力。
 
 本次最終更新將戰役體驗加以強化擴充，並加入新解鎖內容、六位新登場的終極愛國兄弟、四個傳播民主的新挑戰關卡，還有軍事力量的究極展現：修復錯誤！
 
 回歸玩家享受本更新的最佳方式是重新玩一遍戰役，然後再玩一遍，玩到天荒地老。 新兄弟報到 駕馭Seth Brondle（賽夫．搏朗鬥）充滿算計的高智商以及會吐酸的魅力，揮舞Xebro（錫搏）的飛空環刃，跟著彈奏動人音樂的擾亂分子Desperabro（亡命兄弟）用榴彈讓恐怖主義長眠，或是成為怪物的惡夢：投擲木樁、淨化不潔存在、自我復活的青少年Slayer（殺手）！
 
 如果狙擊比較符合你的風格，知名的昆蟲獵人Burt Brommer（搏特．搏肉莫）能用可靠的步槍讓目標準確獲得解脫，Demolition Bro（爆破兄弟）的冰凍榴彈則能把惡人送回他們該去的地方，加以冰封。 新壞蛋登場 面對企圖破壞自由的惡人時，兄弟才會成為戰力。《Broforce Forever》的恐怖分子如今更加堅定，決心要摧毀民主體制。Motorbike Maniacs（摩托車狂徒）會想盡辦法撞倒玩家，定點機槍、帶刺鐵絲、沙包、滿載火箭彈的飛船則會彼此合作，讓兄弟們每次前往占領地區出任務變得異常艱難。 新挑戰降臨 想找更大型戰役的兄弟可以進入Muscle Temples（肌肉神殿），在這些新的挑戰關卡中秀秀肌肉。每場戰役中，各位印第安納．兄斯都必須闖過危險的神殿，克服新的威脅度、特定類型的敵人、各種危險。成功後即可解鎖四項秀肌肉新能力的其中一種，讓任何兄弟隨時隨地使用，就像行使自由一樣。
 
  關於此遊戲 當邪惡威脅世界時，世界就會呼喚Broforce，-一個資金不足但能力過硬、專門處理極端組織的准軍事組織。挺直腰板，與其他幾十個兄弟一樣奔跑、開火，消滅威脅到我們生活方式的恐怖主義。釋放數十種獨特的武器，以自由之名掀起一系列對於火、燒夷彈、肢體等不可思議的連鎖反應。 主要特色   與其他幾十個擁有特殊武器和獨特攻擊技巧的兄弟一樣讓世界感到對你的震驚和敬畏，在世界各地傳播自由的福音。
   在合作模式中與多達四位玩家一起對抗恐怖主義，或是斷絕兄貴關系，在多種誇張的競爭模式中相互對峙。
   入其他兄貴，在地區爆炸和大規模混亂的壓力下穿越這些限時獨特的攻擊關卡。
   可破壞的地形提供了一系列戰略選項，而正義爆炸紅桶™簡直可以一擊掃清戰場。
   運用強大的關卡編輯器，設計你自己的毀滅樂園，分享到網上成為其他兄貴嫉妒的焦點。瀏覽數十個用戶創建的關卡，完成這些關卡並評估它們的兄貴力。

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, the long-awaited free update to 2015’s most patriotic video game, held back from freedom-loving gamers for a crime it didn’t commit, has promptly escaped from a maximum security stockade and unleashes a megaton of Kentucky-fried carnage into the face of evil.
 
 The final update offers an improved and expanded campaign with new unlocks, along with six new ultra-patriotic bros, four new democracy-spreading challenge levels, and the ultimate expression of military might – bug fixes!
 
 The best way for a returning player to enjoy this is to play through the entire campaign again. And again. Forever. NEW BROS Harness the calculating intelligence and acid-spitting allure of Seth Brondle, wield Xebro’s flying Chakram, serenade (and grenade) terrorism with the flamenco firebrand Desperabro, or become the thing monsters have nightmares about, a stake throwing, unholy purging, self-resurrecting teenage Slayer!
 
 If sniping is more your style, famed bug hunter Bro Gummer brings pinpoint liberation with his trusty rifle, while Demolition Bro’s Freeze Grenades put evildoers right back where they belong… ON ICE. NEW BADDIES A Bro only becomes a force when confronted with those who seek to destroy their freedoms, and in Broforce Forever, the terrorists are even more determined to delete democracy. Motorbike Maniacs will try to run you down, while machine gun placements, barbed wire, sandbags and bazooka-laden blimps conspire to make each visit to occupied territory a very, very bad day at the broffice. NEW CHALLENGES Bros in search of even bigger battles can flex their muscles in new challenge levels known as Muscle Temples. Each campaign tasks Indiana Brones with navigating a perilous temple that features a new Threat Level and specific enemy types and hazards. Succeed and unlock one of four new flexes that can be deployed by any Bro, any time, any place. Just like freedom.
 
  About the Game When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force. Brace your loins with up to four players to run ‘n’ gun as dozens of different bros and eliminate the opposing terrorist forces that threaten our way of life. Unleash scores of unique weapons and set off incredible chain reactions of fire, napalm, and limbs in the name of freedom.
 
     The Broforce Deliver your own brand of shock and awe with dozens of bros each with their own unique weaponry and special attacks designed to dispatch freedom across the world. Bro-Op & Deathmatch Battle terrorism with up to four players in cooperative mode or sever ties with your bros and face each other in several bombastic competitive modes. Explosion Run Join up with other bros to tackle these unique time attack levels under the pressure of exploding terrains and mass chaos. Fully Destructible Everything Destructible terrain opens up a slew of strategic options while the abundance of Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ can literally level the playing field with one shot. Level Editor Design your own playground of destruction with a robust level editor and become the envy of all the other bros by sharing them online. Browse through scores of custom user created levels and complete them to rate their Bro-ness.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, la esperada actualización gratuita del juego más patriota de 2015, fue ocultada por un delito que no había cometido. No tardó en fugarse de la prisión en la que se encontraba recluida para soltarle un megatón de libertad en toda la cara a las fuerzas del mal.
 
 La actualización final ofrece una campaña ampliada y mejorada con nuevo contenido que desbloquear, además de seis nuevos bros ultrapatrióticos, cuatro nuevos niveles de desafío en los que esparcir la democracia y la máxima expresión del poderío militar: ¡correcciones de errores!
 
 Para un jugador veterano, la mejor forma de disfrutar de todo esto es volver a jugar toda la campaña otra vez. Y otra. Y así eternamente. NUEVOS BROS Aprovecha la calculadora inteligencia y la seductora capacidad de escupir ácido de Seth Brondle, lanza el chakram volador de Xebro, cántales a los terroristas mientras los masacras con el mariachi asesino Desperabro o conviértete en la peor pesadilla de los monstruos, ¡una cazadora lanzaestacas adolescente que purga a los impíos y se autorresucita!
 
 Si lo tuyo es el largo alcance, el famoso cazador de bichos Burt Brommer imparte libertad con precisión gracias a su fiel fusil, mientras que las granadas congeladoras de Demolition Bro dejarán a los malos como se merecen... HELADOS. NUEVOS MALOS Un bro solo es digno de ese título cuando se enfrenta a quienes pretenden destruir la libertad, y en Broforce Forever los terroristas están más decididos que nunca a acabar con la democracia. Maniacos motorizados intentarán atropellarte, mientras que los puestos de ametralladoras, el alambre de espino, los sacos de arena y los dirigibles repletos de bazucas harán que cada excursión por territorio ocupado sea peor que un arma que se queda sin munición. NUEVOS DESAFÍOS Los bros que busquen batallas aún más grandes pueden exhibir sus músculos en los nuevos niveles de desafío conocidos como Templos del músculo. En cada campaña, Indiana Brones deberá atravesar un peligroso templo que cuenta con un nuevo nivel de amenaza y tipos específicos de enemigos y peligros. Si tienes éxito, desbloquearás una de las cuatro nuevas flexiones de músculos, que todos los bros podrán usar en cualquier momento y lugar en nombre de la libertad.
 
  Acerca del juego Cuando el mal amenaza al mundo, el mundo llama a Broforce, una organización paramilitar tan musculada como mal financiada que se especializa en el uso excesivo de la fuerza. Reparte libertad con hasta cuatro jugadores mientras corres y disparas con decenas de bros diferentes y elimina a los terroristas que ponen en peligro nuestra forma de vida. Emplea montones de armas únicas y provoca increíbles reacciones en cadena repletas de fuego, napalm y extremidades en nombre de la libertad. Broforce Arrasa con todo a tu manera con decenas de bros, cada uno con armas y ataques especiales únicos, diseñados para repartir libertad por todo el mundo. Modo Bro-Op (Broperativo) y Combate a muerte Enfréntate al terrorismo con hasta tres jugadores más en el modo cooperativo o corta lazos con tus bros y enfréntate a ellos en uno de los numerosos y bombásticos modos competitivos. Explosion Run (Carrera explosiva) Únete a otros bros para superar estos caóticos niveles contrarreloj mientras el terreno explota. Fully Destructible Everything (Entorno totalmente destruible) El terreno destruible ofrece un sinfín de posibilidades estratégicas, mientras que la abundancia de Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ (Barriles rojos explosivos de la justicia™) puede cambiar el panorama con solamente un disparo. Editor de niveles Diseña tu propio campo de juegos de destrucción con un potente editor de niveles y compártelo online para ser la envidia de todos los demás bros. Descubre, completa y puntúa incontables niveles creados por usuarios.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, la mise à jour gratuite tant attendue du jeu le plus patriotique de 2015, refusée aux gamers épris de liberté pour un crime qu'elle n'a pas commis, s'est échappée d'une prison de haute sécurité pour expédier une mégatonne de carnage dans la tronche du mal.
 
 Cette ultime mise à jour propose une campagne améliorée et élargie avec du nouveau contenu à débloquer, six Bros ultra-patriotiques, quatre niveaux de défi pour répandre la démocratie, et le summum de la puissance militaire : des corrections de bugs !
 
 La meilleure façon d'en profiter pour les joueurs de la première heure est de rejouer au mode campagne, et d'y rejouer encore et encore, pour toujours et à jamais. DE NOUVEAUX BROS Mettez à profit l'esprit calculateur et la personnalité acide de Seth Brondle, maniez le chakram volant de Xebro, jouez la sérénade (et de la grenade) contre le terrorisme avec les mariachis du provocateur Desperabro, ou devenez le pire cauchemar de tous les monstres : une ado qui chasse les impies en lançant des pieux et revient à la vie toute seule comme une grande !
 
 Si vous êtes plutôt tireur d'élite, le célèbre chasseur d'insectes Burt Brommer et son fidèle fusil apportent la liberté avec une précision chirurgicale, tandis que Demolition Bro jette un froid chez les malfaiteurs avec ses Freeze Grenades (grenades givrantes). DE NOUVEAUX MÉCHANTS L'étendue du talent d'un Bro se mesure lorsqu'il est confronté à ceux qui cherchent à bafouer ses libertés, et dans Broforce Forever, les terroristes sont plus déterminés que jamais à anéantir la démocratie. Les Motorbike Maniacs (Fous du guidon) tenteront de vous écraser, tandis que les mitrailleuses, les barbelés, les sacs de sable et les dirigeables chargés de bazooka transformeront chaque excursion en territoire ennemi en une journée très, très chargée au buBro. DE NOUVEAUX DÉFIS Les Bros qui veulent toujours plus de bagarre peuvent montrer leurs biscotos dans les Muscle Temples (Temples du muscle), des défis où Indiana Brones doit braver de nouveaux degrés de menace, des ennemis et des dangers uniques. Si vous survivez, vous débloquerez l'une des quatre nouvelles frimes utilisables par n'importe quel Bro, n'importe où et n'importe quand. Comme la liberté !
 
  À propos du jeu Quand l'ombre du mal plane sur le monde, les nations se tournent vers la Broforce, une organisation paramilitaire sous-financée et surarmée qui ne jure que par l'usage excessif de la force. Mettez-vous sur le pied de guerre avec jusqu'à quatre joueurs, choisissez parmi des dizaines de Bros différents et canardez les forces terroristes qui menacent notre mode de vie. Déchaînez une multitude d'armes et faites pleuvoir le feu, le napalm et les membres dans des réactions en chaîne délirantes au nom de la liberté. La Broforce Semez le chaos et la terreur à votre sauce avec des dizaines de Bros, chacun doté d'un armement unique et d'attaques spéciales conçues pour répandre la liberté à travers le globe. Bro-Op et Deathmatch (match à mort) Combattez le terrorisme avec jusqu'à quatre joueurs en mode coopératif ou coupez les ponts avec vos potes dans plusieurs modes compétitifs déjantés. Explosion Run (course explosive) Rejoignez d'autres Bros dans ces niveaux uniques de course contre la montre et frayez-vous un chemin à travers des terrains absolument chaotiques. Destruction à volonté Les niveaux destructibles offrent une grande variété de stratégies, et les Barils rouges explosifs de la Justice™ en abondance vous permettent de raser le champ de bataille en un seul tir. Éditeur de niveaux Créez vos propres terrains de jeu explosifs grâce à un éditeur de niveaux performant et partagez-les en ligne pour rendre vos potes verts de jalousie. Parcourez des galeries entières de niveaux créés par d'autres joueurs et terminez-les pour évaluer leur degré de "Bro-titude".

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, das langersehnte Update für das patriotischste Videospiel des Jahres 2015, wurde freiheitsliebenden Spielern wegen eines nicht begangenen Verbrechens vorenthalten, entkam dem Hochsicherheitsknast und lässt nun ein Megagemetzel nach Kentucky-Art auf das Böse los.
 
 Dieses abschließende Update bietet eine verbesserte und erweiterte Kampagne mit neuen Freischaltungen, sowie sechs neue ultra-patriotische Bros, vier neue Herausforderungslevel zum Verbreiten der Demokratie und die ultimative Bekundung militärischer Macht: Fehlerbehebungen!
 
 Wer das Spiel schon kennt, kann all das durch erneutes Spielen der gesamten Kampagne am besten genießen. Und wieder und wieder. Für immer. NEUE BROS Nutze die berechnende Intelligenz und das Säurespeien von Seth Brondle, führe Xebros fliegendes Chakram, bring dem Terrorismus mit dem Mariachi-Hitzkopf Desperabro ein (explosives) Ständchen oder werde zum Albtraum aller Monster: eine Pflöcke schleudernde, Dämonen bekämpfende, sich selbst wiederbelebende, jugendliche Jägerin!
 
 Wenn präzise Schüsse eher dein Stil sind, kann der berühmte Insektenjäger Burt Brommer mit seinem zuverlässigen Gewehr punktgenaue Befreiung bringen, während Demolition Bros Freeze Grenades (Frostgranaten) Bösewichte AUF EIS legen, wie es sich gehört. NEUE SCHURKEN Ein Bro ist erst dann in seinem Element, wenn er gegen die antritt, die seine Freiheit vernichten wollen, und in Broforce Forever arbeiten die Terroristen noch entschlossener an der Auslöschung der Demokratie. Motorbike Maniacs (Motorradfanatiker) versuchen dich zu überfahren und machen jeden Besuch in besetztem Gebiet zusammen mit MG-Nestern, Stacheldraht, Sandsäcken und Luftschiffen voller Panzerfäuste zu einem sehr, sehr harten Weg, dir deine Bro-tchen zu verdienen. NEUE HERAUSFORDERUNGEN Bros, die noch größere Schlachten suchen, können sich in neuen Herausforderungsleveln beweisen: den Muscle Temples (Muskeltempeln). In jeder Kampagne muss Indiana Brones einen gefährlichen Tempel durchqueren, der ein neues Bedrohungsmeter sowie bestimmte Gegnertypen und Risiken bietet. Schaffe das, und du schaltest eines von vier neuen Muskelspielen frei, das jeder Bro dann jederzeit und überall einsetzen kann. Genau wie die Freiheit.
 
  Infos zum Spiel Wenn wieder einmal das Böse die Welt bedroht, muss die Broforce die Kastanien aus dem Feuer holen – eine unterfinanzierte, übermächtige paramilitärische Organisation, spezialisiert auf exzessive Gewaltanwendung. Ziehe mit bis zu drei Kumpels in die Schlacht und eliminiere in der Rolle dutzender „Bros“ die Terroristen, die unsere Lebensweise bedrohen. Setze eine Vielzahl einzigartiger Waffen ein und löse im Namen des Friedens unglaubliche Kettenreaktionen aus Feuer, Napalm und abgetrennten Gliedmaßen aus. Die Broforce Setze deine eigene Art von Schocktaktik ein und wähle aus dutzenden von Bros, wobei jeder mit eigenen Waffen und Spezialangriffen ausgestattet ist, die zum Verbreiten der Freiheit in der Welt entwickelt wurden. Bro-Op & Deathmatch Bekämpfe den Terrorismus in einem Koop-Team von bis zu vier Spielern oder wende dich gegen deine Bros und tritt in mehreren bombastischen Wettkampfmodi gegen sie an. Explosion Run (Explosionslauf) Tu dich mit anderen Bros zusammen und bewältige diese speziellen Level im Wettlauf gegen die Zeit, während das Gelände explodiert und alles im Chaos versinkt. Alles komplett zerstörbar Das zerstörbare Gelände eröffnet eine Fülle strategischer Optionen und dank der zahlreichen Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ (roten Explosivfässer der Gerechtigkeit™) kannst du das Spielfeld buchstäblich mit einem Schuss dem Erdboden gleichmachen. Level-Editor Gestalte mit dem robusten Level-Editor dein eigenes Spielfeld der Zerstörung und sichere dir den Neid der anderen Bros, indem du deine Kreationen online teilst. Durchstöbere zahllose von Nutzern erstellte Level und schließe sie ab, um ihre Bro-ness zu bewerten.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, a tão esperada atualização grátis do jogo mais patriota de 2015, afastada dos amantes da liberdade por um crime que não cometeu, escapou de uma prisão de segurança máxima e vai soltar carnificina em doses industriais sobre toda e qualquer ameaça.
 
 A última atualização oferece uma campanha melhorada e expandida com novos itens a desbloquear, bem como seis novos Bros mega patriotas, quatro novos níveis de desafio por onde espalhar a democracia e a derradeira demonstração de poder militar: correções de erros!
 
 A melhor maneira de te divertires ao voltar ao jogo é espalhar brasas através da campanha toda. Uma e outra vez. Para sempre. NOVOS BROS Tira partido da inteligência calculista e do encanto cuspidor de ácido de Seth Brondle, empunha o Chakram voador da Xebro, faz uma serenata (explosiva) ao terrorismo com o mariachi Desperabro ou torna-te aquilo que os próprios monstros temem: uma Caçadora adolescente que lança estacas, faz purgas profanas e consegue ressuscitar!
 
 Se o teu estilo é mais o de atirador furtivo, o famoso caçador de insetos Burt Brommer conquista liberdade com a precisão da sua fiel carabina, enquanto as granadas congelantes do Demolition Bro devolvem os malfeitores a onde pertencem… AO GELO. NOVOS VILÕES Um Bro só usa a força quando é confrontado pela destruição da sua liberdade. E em Broforce Forever, os terroristas estão ainda mais determinados a eliminar a democracia. Os Motorbike Maniacs vão tentar atropelar-te e aplicar metralhadoras fixas, arame farpado, sacos de areia e dirigíveis carregados de bazucas, para tornar um autêntico martírio cada visita que fizeres ao território ocupado. NOVOS DESAFIOS Os Bros que procurem batalhas ainda mais imponentes podem mostrar os músculos em novos níveis de desafio conhecidos como Muscle Temples (Templos dos Músculos). Em cada campanha, o Indiana Brones terá de explorar um templo perigoso com um novo nível de ameaça, bem como inimigos de tipos e riscos específicos. Triunfa e desbloqueia uma de quatro novas poses que podem ser aplicadas por qualquer Bro, em qualquer altura, em qualquer lugar. Tal como a liberdade.
 
  Acerca do jogo Quando forças maléficas ameaçam o mundo, é chamada a Broforce, uma organização paramilitar com poucos recursos, mas com poder de sobra e que só trabalha na base da força bruta. Cerra os dentes e prepara-te para tiroteios explosivos com até quatro jogadores e dezenas de Bros diferentes. Elimina as forças terroristas que ameaçam o nosso modo de vida! Usa carradas de armas únicas e detona reações em cadeia de fogo, napalm e pedaços de inimigos… em nome da liberdade! A Broforce Causa choque e pavor à tua maneira com dezenas de Bros, cada um com o seu armamento e ataques especiais. Distribui resmas de liberdade pelo mundo fora. Bro-Op e Deathmatch (Todos contra todos) Combate o terrorismo com até quatro jogadores no modo cooperativo ou corta laços com os teus Bros e enfrentem-se em vários modos competitivos absolutamente bombásticos. Explosion Run (Fuga explosiva) Junta-te a outros Bros para enfrentar estes níveis contrarrelógio únicos sob a pressão de terrenos que explodem e um caos descomunal. Destrói tudo O terreno destrutível permite todo um leque de opções estratégicas, ao passo que a abundância de Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ (Barris Vermelhos Explosivos da Justiça™) pode literalmente nivelar o terreno com um único tiro. Editor de níveis Desenha o teu recreio de destruição com um robusto editor de níveis e faz inveja aos outros Bros ao partilhá-lo online. Também podes explorar os níveis criados por outros utilizadores e completá-los para avaliar se são mesmo dignos de um Bro.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 『Broforce Forever』は、2015年に最も愛国心のあるゲームに向けた待望の無料大型アップデートだ！ 無実の罪で自由を愛するゲーマーから奪われていた本アップデートが、最高セキュリティーの収容所から今まさに脱出し、悪の組織にメガトン級の大虐殺を食らわせようとしている。
 
 この最終アップデートでは、6人の新たなアニキたちや、民主主義を広める4種類のチャレンジステージ、そして究極の軍事的表現であろうバグ修正が含まれ、改善と拡張がほどこされたキャンペーンを楽しむことができる！
 
 かつてのプレイヤーたちが『Broforce Forever』を楽しむための最善の方法は、もう一度全キャンペーンを遊びなおすことだ。さらに、もう一度。そして、永遠に…。 新たなアニキたち Seth Brondleの狡猾な知性と酸を撒き散らすような魅力を利用したり、Xebroの宙を舞うチャクラムを操ったり、フラメンコの火付け役Desperabroと共にセレナーデ（＆グレネード）のテロを引き起こしたり…もしくは、自己再生するティーンエイシャーのSlayerになり、怪物たちが杭によって浄化される悪夢を見てしまうような存在となろう！
 
 もしスナイピングのほうが好みに合うのなら、有名な虫ハンターBro Gummerが信頼するライフルを手に極めて正確な自由をもたらし、Demolition Broの凍結グレネードが悪の軍勢を氷の中へと再度封じ込めてくれる。 新たな宿敵 アニキは自由を破壊しようと企む者たちと対峙することで初めて力を発揮するが、『Broforce Forever』では、テロリストたちが民主主義を破壊する決意をより一層強固なものにしている。Motorbike Maniacsはアニキたちを追跡しながら、機関銃、有刺鉄線、土のうの設置やバズーカを積んだ飛行船を呼び込もうとし、アニキたちにとって最悪の一日を占領地で毎度お見舞いしてくるだろう。 新たなチャレンジ Muscle Templesとして知られる新しいチャレンジステージでは、さらに大規模な戦いを求めるアニキたちの筋肉を鍛え上げることができる。各キャンペーンでIndiana Bronesに課せられるのは、新たな危険度、特殊な敵タイプ、危険物が登場する寺院のナビゲートだ。見事に成功すれば、すべてのアニキがいつでもどこでも使用できる4種類のうち1種類の新たな力がアンロックされる。そう、まるで自由そのもののようにだ。
 
  ゲームについて 世界に悪がはびこるとき、彼らが立ちあがる。金はなくとも超火力、やるときはやる（やりすぎる）準軍事組織、その名もブロフォース！ 最大4人でのプレイが可能。問答無用で銃を撃ちまくりながら、ステージを駆け抜けろ。操作可能なアニキは数十人におよぶ。ユニークな武器も多数登場。爆発に次ぐ爆発、連鎖するナパーム、四散する肉体。平和を脅かすテロリストを相手に、自由の名の下に好き放題やれ。 The Broforce 世界中に自由をもたらすために作られたユニークな武器と特殊攻撃を備えた数十人のアニキたちと共に、衝撃と畏怖たる我々の名を世に轟かせよう。 協力＆デスマッチ 最大4人のプレイヤーと協力モードでテロリストに対抗したり、アニキたちの絆を断ち切り、激しい対戦モードで対決したりしよう。 爆発だらけのラン 他のアニキたちと合流し、爆発する地形と大規模なカオスが待ち構えるユニークなタイムアタックステージに挑戦しよう。 破壊できぬ物はなし 破壊可能な地形が多くの戦略を生み出す中で、大量の「正義の爆発性赤バレル™」は一撃で戦場を更地へと変える。 ステージ・エディット 屈強なステージ・エディットを使ってデザインした自身の戦場をオンラインで共有して、世界中のアニキたちの羨望の的となろう。プレイヤーが作り出したステージをチェックしてクリアしたら、彼らのアニキ度合いを評価してあげよう。

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, the long-awaited free update to 2015’s most patriotic video game, held back from freedom-loving gamers for a crime it didn’t commit, has promptly escaped from a maximum security stockade and unleashes a megaton of Kentucky-fried carnage into the face of evil.
 
 The final update offers an improved and expanded campaign with new unlocks, along with six new ultra-patriotic bros, four new democracy-spreading challenge levels, and the ultimate expression of military might – bug fixes!
 
 The best way for a returning player to enjoy this is to play through the entire campaign again. And again. Forever. NEW BROS Harness the calculating intelligence and acid-spitting allure of Seth Brondle, wield Xebro’s flying Chakram, serenade (and grenade) terrorism with the flamenco firebrand Desperabro, or become the thing monsters have nightmares about, a stake throwing, unholy purging, self-resurrecting teenage Slayer!
 
 If sniping is more your style, famed bug hunter Bro Gummer brings pinpoint liberation with his trusty rifle, while Demolition Bro’s Freeze Grenades put evildoers right back where they belong… ON ICE. NEW BADDIES A Bro only becomes a force when confronted with those who seek to destroy their freedoms, and in Broforce Forever, the terrorists are even more determined to delete democracy. Motorbike Maniacs will try to run you down, while machine gun placements, barbed wire, sandbags and bazooka-laden blimps conspire to make each visit to occupied territory a very, very bad day at the broffice. NEW CHALLENGES Bros in search of even bigger battles can flex their muscles in new challenge levels known as Muscle Temples. Each campaign tasks Indiana Brones with navigating a perilous temple that features a new Threat Level and specific enemy types and hazards. Succeed and unlock one of four new flexes that can be deployed by any Bro, any time, any place. Just like freedom.
 
  About the Game When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force. Brace your loins with up to four players to run ‘n’ gun as dozens of different bros and eliminate the opposing terrorist forces that threaten our way of life. Unleash scores of unique weapons and set off incredible chain reactions of fire, napalm, and limbs in the name of freedom.
 
     The Broforce Deliver your own brand of shock and awe with dozens of bros each with their own unique weaponry and special attacks designed to dispatch freedom across the world. Bro-Op & Deathmatch Battle terrorism with up to four players in cooperative mode or sever ties with your bros and face each other in several bombastic competitive modes. Explosion Run Join up with other bros to tackle these unique time attack levels under the pressure of exploding terrains and mass chaos. Fully Destructible Everything Destructible terrain opens up a slew of strategic options while the abundance of Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ can literally level the playing field with one shot. Level Editor Design your own playground of destruction with a robust level editor and become the envy of all the other bros by sharing them online. Browse through scores of custom user created levels and complete them to rate their Bro-ness.

当邪恶威胁世界时,世界就会呼唤 Broforce,-一个资金不足但能力过硬、专门处理极端组织的准军事组织。 挺直腰板,与其他几十个兄弟一样奔跑、开火,消灭威胁到我们生活方式的恐怖主义。 释放数十种独特的武器,以自由之名掀起一系列对于火、烧夷弹、肢体等不可思议的连锁反应。

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever er den længeventede, gratis opdatering til det mest patriotiske spil i 2015. Frihedselskende gamere har hungret efter den, og nu har den endelig undsluppet sit triste fangenskab og er klar til at besejre ondskaben med et brag af en anden verden.
 
 Den seneste opdatering giver dig forbedrede og udvidede kampagner med nye oplåselige genstande samt seks nye ultra-patriotiske bros, fire nye demokratispredende udfordringsbaner og den ultimative militærmagtdemonstration: Fejlrettelser!
 
 Tilbagevendende spillere får mest nydelse ud af at spille hele kampagnen igen. Og igen. For evigt. NYE BROS Behersk Seth Brondles nøjeregnende intelligens og syrespyttende tiltrækningskraft, kæmp med Xebros flyvende chakram, få terroristerne til at ryste i bukserne med Desperabros knivskarpe skønsang, eller bliv den, som monstrene har mareridt om: Den pælkastende, dæmonfordrivende og selvvækkende teenager, Slayer!
 
 Hvis du er mere til snigmord, kan du træde ind i rollen som den berømte Burt Brommer, der uddeler frihed med knivskarpe skud, mens Demolition Bros Freeze Grenades (Isgranater) sætter ondskaben på køl. NYE SKURKE En sand bro bruger kun sine kræfter, når han står over for dem, der ønsker at ødelægge friheden, og i Broforce Forever er terroristerne endnu mere stålsatte på at smadre demokratiet. Motorbike Maniacs vil forsøge at køre dig over, mens luftskibe med maskinpistoler, pigtråd, sandsække og bazookaer forsøger med al magt at sende dig på brospitalet. NYE UDFORDRINGER Bros, der er på udkig efter endnu større kampe, kan flekse deres muskler i nye udfordringsbaner, også kendt som Muscle Temples (Muskeltempler). Hver kampagne udfordrer Indiana Brones til at kæmpe sig gennem et farligt tempel, hvor indeholder et nyt trusselsniveau og specifikke fjendetyper og farer. Hvis du gennemfører, kan du låse op for en af fire nye flekser, der kan bruges af enhver bro, når om helst, hvor som helst. Ligesom frihed.
 
  Om spillet Da ondskaben truer verden, hidkaldes Broforce – en underfinansieret og overbevæbnet paramilitær organisation, der udelukkende gør brug af overdrevet vold. Gør dig klar til at kaste dig ud i kamp med op til fire spillere, hvor I i rollerne som forskellige bros, skal smadre jer gennem fjendtlige terroriststyrker, der truer jeres livsførelse. Fyr den af med masser af forskellige våben, og sæt gang i utrolige kædereaktioner af ild, napalm og lemmer i frihedens navn. The Broforce Chokér og imponér i rollen som masser af forskellige bros, som hver har sit egent unikke våbenarsenal og specialangreb, der er designet til at sprede frihed verden over. Bro-Op & Deathmatch (Samarbejde & dødskamp) Bekæmp terrorisme sammen med op til fire spillere i samarbejdsspil, eller slå hånden af dine bros, og kæmp mod hinanden i flere bombastiske konkurrencespiltyper. Explosion Run (Eksplosionsbane) Slut dig til andre bros for at tackle unikke angrebsbaner på tid, mens bomber og kaos suser jer om ørerne. Fully Destructible Everything (Alt kan smadres) Smadrevenligt terræn giver dig en masse forskellige strategiske muligheder, mens et overflødighedshorn af Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ (Eksplosive røde retfærdighedstønder™) helt bogstaveligt kan jævne en bane med jorden med et brag. Level Editor (Baneværktøj) Design din egen destruktive legeplads med et solidt baneværktøj, og mærk dine bros misundelse, når du deler dem online. Gennemse massevis af brugerdefinerede baner, og kæmp i dem for at give dem din bro-vurdering.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, l'attesissimo aggiornamento gratuito del videogioco più patriottico del 2015, tenuto nascosto ai giocatori amanti della libertà per un crimine mai commesso, è fuggito da una prigione militare di massima sicurezza e ha scatenato un megatone di carneficine contro il male.
 
 L'ultimo aggiornamento offre una campagna migliorata e ampliata con nuovi elementi sbloccabili, sei nuovi Bro super patriottici, quattro nuovi livelli di sfida che diffondono democrazia e la massima espressione della potenza militare: le correzioni di bug!
 
 Per i giocatori storici, il modo migliore di goderselo è quello di rigiocare l'intera campagna. Più volte. Per sempre. NUOVI BRO Sfrutta l'intelligenza calcolatrice e il fascino sputa-acido di Seth Brondle, brandisci il Chakram volante di Xebro, fai una serenata (e lancia una granata) al terrorismo con il mariachi testa calda Desperabro o diventa l'incubo dei mostri: una cacciatrice adolescente che lancia paletti, epura la malvagità e si rianima da sola!
 
 Se il cecchinaggio fa per te, il famoso cacciatore Burt Brommer porterà la libertà con il suo fucile, mentre le Freeze Grenades (Granate congelanti) di Demolition Bro faranno restare i nemici... DI GHIACCIO. NUOVI NEMICI Un Bro diventa forte quando si confronta con chi vuole minare le sue libertà, e in Broforce Forever i terroristi sono ancora più determinati a eliminare la democrazia. I Motorbike Maniacs (Motomaniaci) cercheranno di investirti, e mitragliatrici, filo spinato, sacchi di sabbia e dirigibili carichi di bazooka renderanno ogni visita al territorio occupato un'impresa ardua che metterà a dura prova la pazienza dei Bro. NUOVE SFIDE I Bro in cerca di battaglie ancora maggiori possono mostrare i muscoli nei nuovi livelli di sfida conosciuti come Muscle Temples (Templi muscolari). Ogni campagna richiede che Indiana Brones attraversi un tempio pericoloso che presenta un nuovo livello minaccia e tipi di nemici e pericoli specifici. Supera l'impresa e sblocca una delle quattro nuove pose per mostrare i muscoli utilizzabili da qualsiasi Bro, quando e dove vuoi. Come la libertà.
 
  Informazioni sul gioco Quando il male minaccia il mondo, il mondo chiama in aiuto Broforce, un'organizzazione paramilitare potente ma sottofinanziata che agisce con violenza eccessiva. Insieme a un massimo di quattro giocatori, corri e spara nei panni di Bro diversi ed elimina le forze terroriste nemiche che minacciano la nostra vita. Manda a segno attacchi con armi uniche e innesca reazioni a catena a suon di spari, napalm e violenza in nome della libertà. Broforce Sfodera il tuo stile di colpi e sbalordisci tutti con decine di Bro, ognuno con armi e attacchi speciali personali ideati per riportare la libertà nel mondo. Bro-Op e Deathmatch (Modalità Brooperativa e Deathmatch) Combatti il terrorismo insieme a un massimo di quattro giocatori in modalità cooperativa o separati dai tuoi Bro affrontandoli in tante eccezionali modalità competitive. Explosion Run (Corsa esplosiva) Unisciti ai Bro e affronta livelli a tempo unici su terreni esplosivi e caos assoluto. Fully Destructible Everything (Distruttibilità totale) L'ambiente distruttibile offre infinite opzioni strategiche, e usando Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ (Barili esplosivi rossi della Giustizia™) è possibile radere al suolo ogni cosa in un solo colpo. Editor livelli Crea la tua area personale di distruzione con un fantastico editor livelli e suscita l'invidia di tutti gli altri Bro tramite la condivisione online. Sfoglia decine di livelli personalizzati creati dagli utenti e completali per valutare il loro cameratismo.

game.brief: When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force. Brace your loins with up to four players to run ‘n’ gun as dozens of different bros and eliminate the opposing terrorist forces that threaten our way of life. Unleash scores of unique weapons and set off incredible chain reactions of fire, napalm, and limbs in the name of freedom.

game.title: Batman: Arkham Asylum
game.description:
Batman: Arkham Asylum is an action-adventure game developed by Rocksteady Studios and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. Released in 2009, it follows Batman as he battles the Joker, who seizes control of Arkham Asylum and frees its inmates. The game features stealth, combat, and detective elements, with players using Batman's gadgets and skills to subdue enemies and solve puzzles.

Set in a dark, immersive version of Gotham, the story explores Batman’s psychological battle with his foes, including Harley Quinn, Bane, and Scarecrow. The game received critical acclaim for its gameplay, atmosphere, and storytelling, becoming a defining title in superhero video games.

After the Joker assaults Gotham City Hall, he is caught by Batman and taken to Arkham Asylum, which temporarily houses many members of the Joker's gang, who were transferred after a fire at Blackgate Prison. Believing the Joker allowed himself to be captured, Batman accompanies him into the asylum. The Joker's plan is revealed as Harley Quinn takes control of the security and the Joker escapes into the facility, aided by a corrupt guard who kidnaps Commissioner Gordon. The Joker threatens to detonate bombs hidden around Gotham City if anyone tries to enter Arkham, forcing Batman to work alone. Tracking Quinn to the medical facility to rescue Gordon, Batman is exposed to the Scarecrow's fear toxin and hallucinates, seeing Gordon's death and the corpses of his parents talking to him. After fighting off Scarecrow, Batman finds and subdues Quinn before rescuing Gordon. The Joker then directs Batman to the captured Bane, who has been experimented on by asylum doctor Penelope Young. The Joker frees Bane and Batman is forced to fight him, during which Quinn escapes. Afterward, he goes to a secret Batcave installation he had hidden on the island, where Batman restocks his gadgets.

There, Batman learns that the Joker returned to the asylum to gain access to Young, who has been developing Titan—a more powerful version of the Venom drug that gives Bane his strength—intending to use it to help patients survive more strenuous therapies. Young learned that the Joker had been funding her research to create an army of superhuman henchmen; her refusal to hand over the formula precipitated Joker's return to the Asylum. While searching for Young, Batman is again attacked by Scarecrow and the fear toxin, and hallucinates the night of his parents' deaths. After he recovers, Batman destroys Young's Titan formula and rescues Young from Victor Zsasz. An explosion kills Young and the Joker obtains the completed batches of Titan.

At the Penitentiary, Quinn releases Poison Ivy from her cell before being imprisoned by Batman. Quinn accidentally reveals that Joker has a Titan production facility in the Arkham botanical gardens. Batman travels there and learns that Titan is created by genetically modified plants. He enlists Ivy's help to create an antidote and learns that it can only be made from spores found exclusively in Killer Croc's lair in a sewer. En route to Croc, Batman is again attacked by Scarecrow and overcomes several doses of fear toxin. Meanwhile, Joker injects Ivy with Titan, enhancing her powers. Ivy begins ravaging Arkham Island with giant mutant plants. Pursued by Batman into Croc's lair, Scarecrow is attacked by Croc and dragged underwater. Batman recovers the necessary spores and subdues Croc before returning to the Batcave, but can only synthesize one dose of the antidote before Ivy's plants breach the cave and destroy his equipment.

Batman returns to the botanical gardens and defeats Ivy, halting the rampaging plants. The Joker announces that the preparations for his party are finally complete and Batman travels to the asylum's visitor center where the Joker's applauding henchmen welcome him. The Joker reveals he has recaptured Gordon and tries to shoot him with a Titan-filled dart; Batman leaps to Gordon's defense and is shot instead. Batman attempts to resist the change, and an upset Joker takes an overdose of Titan, mutating into a massive monster. In a makeshift arena on the building's roof, the Joker challenges Batman to a fight as Titan-induced monsters in front of news helicopters. Batman refuses to transform, uses the antidote on himself, and defeats the Titan-affected Joker and his henchmen, knocking his nemesis unconscious with an explosive gel-enhanced punch. In the aftermath, those affected by Titan begin to revert to normal, including the Joker—who is restrained and taken into custody as police officers retake the asylum. Batman overhears a call about a crime led by Two-Face in progress and flies back to Gotham City in the Batwing. In a post-credits scene, a crate of Titan formula is shown floating in the ocean near the asylum when a hand surfaces and grabs it.

广受好评的《蝙蝠侠：阿卡姆疯人院》强势回归，为玩家奉上重新制作的年度游戏版大作，内含 4 个加码挑战地图，这些地图包括：“犯罪巷”、“稻草人的噩梦”，以及出自于“疯狂之夜地图包”的“彻底疯狂”以及“夜间猎人”。
佳評如潮的 Batman: Arkham Asylum 將以重製的年度遊戲版重新回歸，內含 4 張額外挑戰地圖：「Crime Alley」、「Scarecrow Nightmare」，以及出自於 Insane Night 地圖套件的「Totally Insane」及「Nocturnal Hunter」。

Critically acclaimed Batman: Arkham Asylum returns with a remastered Game of the Year Edition, featuring 4 extra Challenge Maps. The additional Challenge Maps are Crime Alley; Scarecrow Nightmare; Totally Insane and Nocturnal Hunter (both from the Insane Night Map Pack).
 					  Utilize the unique FreeFlow™ combat system to chain together unlimited combos seamlessly and battle with huge groups of The Joker’s henchmen in brutal melee brawls 
 					  Investigate as Batman, the WORLD’S GREATEST DETECTIVE, by solving intricate puzzles with the help of cutting edge forensic tools including x-ray scanning, fingerprint scans, ‘Amido Black’ spray and a pheromone tracker
 					  Face off against Gotham’s greatest villains including The Joker, HARLEY QUINN, POISON IVY and KILLER CROC 
 					  Become the Invisible Predator™ with Batman’s fear takedowns and unique vantage point system to move without being seen and hunt enemies  
 					  Choose multiple takedown methods, including swooping from the sky and smashing through walls. 
 					  Explore every inch of Arkham Asylum and roam freely on the infamous island, presented for the first time ever in its gritty and realistic entirety
 					  Experience what it’s like to be BATMAN using BATARANGS, explosive gel aerosol, The Batclaw, sonar resonator and the line launcher 
 					  Unlock more secrets by completing hidden challenges in the world and develop and customize equipment by earning experience points 
 					  Enjoy complete superhero freedom in the environment with the use of Batman’s grapnel gun to get to any place you can see, jump from any height and glide in any direction

El juego aclamado por la crítica Batman: Arkham Asylum vuelve en la edición remasterizada Juego del Año, con nuevos 4 mapas para Challenge. Los nuevos mapas de Challenge son Crime Alley, Scarecrow Nightmare, Totally Insane y Nocturnal Hunter (ambos del Insane Night Map Pack).
   Utiliza el sistema de combate único FreeFlow™ para encadenar una cantidad ilimitada de combos de forma fluida y luchar contra enormes grupos de secuaces del Jocker en brutales enfrentamientos cuerpo a cuerpo.
   Investiga como Batman, el MEJOR DETECTIVE DEL MUNDO, resolviendo complejos puzles con la ayuda de tecnología forense de última generación incluyendo un escáner de rayos X, lectores de huellas digitales, el spray 'Amido Black' y un detector de feromonas.
   Enfréntate a los villanos más grandes de Gotham incluyendo al JOKER, HARLEY QUINN, HIEDRA VENENOSA y COCODRILO ASESINO.
   Conviértete en el Depredador Invisible™ con los aterradores asaltos por sorpresa de Batman y un sistema único de puntos de ventaja para moverte sin ser detectado y cazar a tus enemigos.
   Escoge múltiples métodos de asalto, tales como descender desde las alturas y atravesar paredes.
   Explora cada centímetro del ARKHAM ASYLUM™ y recorre con total libertad la infame isla, presentada por primera vez en su cruda y realista totalidad.
   Experimenta qué se siente al ser BATMAN utilizando BATARANGS, un gel explosivo en aerosol, la BATGARRA, el resonador de sónar y el lanzador de cable.
   Desbloquea más secretos al completar desafíos ocultos en el mundo y desarrolla y personaliza tu equipo ganando puntos de experiencia.
   Desplázate por el mapa utilizando la pistola de gancho de Batman para llegar a lugares inalcanzables, y saltar desde cualquier altura para planear en cualquier dirección.

Le jeu Batman: Arkham Asylum, récompensé par les critiques, revient dans une édition remastérisée "Game of the Year" qui comporte 4 nouvelles cartes pour le mode Défi. Dans ce lot de 4 cartes figurent l'Allée du Crime, Cauchemar, Complètement fou, et Chasseur Nocturne (les deux dernières proviennent du pack de cartes Nuit démentielle).
   Tirez parti du système de combat FreeFlow™ pour enchaîner les combos sans aucune transition et éliminer brutalement les larges groupes d'hommes de main du Joker 
   Vous êtes Batman, le plus grand des justiciers. Menez l'enquête en résolvant des énigmes retorses, en vous aidant d'outils ultra-sophistiqués de la police scientifique : scan aux rayons x, scan d'empreintes digitales, mais aussi le spray "Amido Black" et le pisteur de phéromone.
   Affrontez les plus grands malfrats de Gotham City : le Joker, Harley Quinn, Victor Zsasz et Killer Croc.
   Devenez un véritable Prédateur Invisible. Grâce à un système de points d'observation unique et aux attaques de panique qui glacent d'effroi l'adversaire, Batman peut se déplacer furtivement et traquer ses ennemis.
   Plusieurs techniques d'attaque : fondez sur l'ennemi depuis les hauteurs ou brisez les murs. 
   Pour la première fois dans un jeu, explorez de fond en comble l'asile d'Arkham et déplacez-vous en toute liberté sur l'île maudite.
   En vrai justicier, utilisez vos Batarangs, votre gel explosif, la Batgriffe, le sonar, ainsi que le grappin
   Découvrez bien d'autres secrets en terminant des défis cachés dans l'univers du jeu et personnalisez votre équipement en gagnant des points d'expérience.
   Profitez de vos pouvoirs de super-héros avec une liberté d'action totale : utilisez le grappin de Batman pour aller où bon vous semble, pour prendre de la hauteur ou pour glisser le long du câble, dans n'importe quelle direction.

Das von Kritikern gefeierte Batman: Arkham Asylum kehrt in einer überarbeiteten Spiel des Jahres Edition mit 4 Extra 'Challenge Maps' zurück. Diese zusätzlichen Maps sind Crime Alley; Scarecrow Nightmare; Totally Insane und Nocturnal Hunter (diese beiden vom Insane Night Map Pack).
   Nutzen Sie das einzigartige FreeFlow™ Kampfsystem, um unbegrenzt Kombos nahtlos aneinanderzureihen und bekämpfen Sie riesige Horden von Jokers Anhängern in brutalen Nahkampfschlachten 
   Ermitteln Sie als Batman, dem WELTBESTEN DETEKTIV und lösen Sie knifflige Rätsel mit der Hilfe von neuesten Spurensicherungstechnologie inklusive Röntgenstrahlen, Fingerabdruckscannern, ‘Amido Black’ Spray und einem Pheromonaufspürer
   Stellen Sie sich Gothams größten Feinden inklusive Joker, HARLEY QUINN, POISON IVY und KILLER CROC 
   Werden Sie zum unsichtbaren Rächer™ mit Batmans gefürchteten Attacken und dem einzigartigen Blickwinkelsystem, mit dem Sie sich ungesehen fortbewegen und Feinden nachjagen können
   Wählen Sie aus mehreren Angriffstechniken, inklusive Stürze aus der Luft und Durchbrechen von Wänden. 
   Entdecken Sie jeden Winkel von Arkham Asylum und bewegen Sie sich frei auf der berühmt berüchtigten Insel - jetzt zum ersten Mal in all ihrer schmutzigen Realität
   Erfahren Sie, was es bedeutet BATMAN zu sein und verwenden Sie BATARANGS, explosives Gel-Aerosol, die Batclaw, den Sonarresonator und die Line-Launcher
   Schalten Sie weitere Geheimnisse frei und erfüllen Sie verborgene Aufgaben und entwickeln Sie Ihre Ausrüstung weiter, indem Sie Erfahrungspunkte sammeln
   Erfreuen Sie sich an der Freiheit eines Superheldens und nutzen Sie Batmans Schleuderhaken, um jeden sichtbaren Ort zu erklimmen und springen Sie aus jeder Höhe und gleiten Sie durch die Nacht

O aclamado Batman: Arkham Asylum regressa com a Game of the Year Edition remasterizada, que inclui 4 Challenge Maps. Os Challenge Maps adicionais são Crime Alley, Scarecrow Nightmare, Totally Insane e Nocturnal Hunter (estes dois últimos pertencem ao pacote Insane Night Map).
  					
    Utiliza o exclusivo sistema de combate FreeFlow™ para fazeres combinações infinitas de forma fluida e combateres grandes grupos de capangas do Joker em batalhas intensas 
  					
    Investiga como o Batman, o MELHOR DETETIVE DO MUNDO, resolvendo enigmas complicados com a ajuda de ferramentas forenses de última geração, como raios-X, leituras de impressões digitais, o spray "Amido Black" e um localizador de feromonas
  					
    Enfrenta os maiores vilões de Gotham, incluindo o Joker, HARLEY QUINN, POISON IVY e CROCODILO 
  					
    Torna-te o Predador Invisível e usa o Medo para neutralizar inimigos com ataques implacáveis. Com o sistema único de pontos de observação, move-te sem que te vejam e caça os inimigos  
  					
    Escolhe várias formas de neutralizar inimigos, incluindo atacar das alturas e partir paredes. 
  					
    Explora cada canto do Arkham Asylum e vagueia livremente pela infame ilha, apresentada pela primeira vez na sua totalidade realista e sombria
  					
    Sente como é ser o BATMAN com os BATARANGS, gel explosivo em spray, a Batclaw, o ressonador sonar e o lançador de cordas 
  					
    Desbloqueia mais segredos completando desafios escondidos no mundo e desenvolve e personaliza o teu equipamento ao ganhar pontos de experiência 
  					
    Aproveita a liberdade total ao ser um super-herói neste mundo, usando a arma de gancho do Batman para acederes a qualquer lugar à vista, saltares de qualquer altura e planares para onde quiseres

Det kritikerroste Batman: Arkham Asylum vender tilbage i en remastered Game of the Year Edition med fire ekstra udfordrende baner. De ekstra baner er Crime Alley, Scarecrow Nightmare, Totally Insane og Nocturnal Hunter (begge fra Insane Night Map Pack).
  					
    Brug det unikke FreeFlow™-kampsystem til at sammenkæde et ubegrænset antal kombinationer, og gå op imod store grupper af Jokerens håndlangere i brutale nærkampe. 
  					
    Efterforsk forbrydelser som Batman, verdens bedste detektiv, ved at løse udfordrende hovedbrud med hjælp fra banebrydende retsmedicinske teknologier, herunder røntgenscanner, fingeraftryksscanner, Amido Black-spray og en feromontracker.
  					
    Gå op imod Gothams største skurke, inklusive The Joker, Harley Quinn, Poison Ivy og Killer Croc. 
  					
    Spil som Invisible Predator™ med Batmans frygtnedlæggelser og unikke overblik, som giver dig mulighed for at bevæge dig rundt og jagte fjender uden at blive set.  
  					
    Vælg mellem flere nedlæggelsesmetoder, du kan for eksempel angribe fra luften eller brase gennem mure. 
  					
    Udforsk hver eneste tomme af Arkham Asylum, og bevæg dig rundt på den berygtede ø, der for første gang nogensinde præsenteres i al sin gru.
  					
    Oplev, hvordan det er at være BATMAN ved at bruge BATARANGS, en eksplosiv gelspray, din Batclaw, Sonar Resonator og Line Launcher. 
  					
    Lås op for flere hemmeligheder ved at gennemføre skjulte udfordringer, og opgradér og tilpas dit udstyr ved at få erfaringspoint. 
  					
    Oplev total frihed som superhelt i en verden, hvor du kan bruge Batmans krogpistol til at bevæge dig derhen, hvor du har lyst. Spring fra enhver højde, og svæv i enhver retning.

L’acclamato Batman: Arkham Asylum ritorna con una versione Game Of The Year ripensata, con 4 mappe sfida in più. Le mappe sfida aggiuntive sono: Crime Alley, Incubo dello Spaventapasseri, Completamente pazzo e Cacciatore Notturno (entrambe dal pacchetto Mappe: Notte di follia).
  					
    Usa il sistema di combattimento FreeFlow™ per concatenare combo infinite e affronta enormi gruppi di tirapiedi del Joker in risse brutale. 
  					
    Vesti i panni del detective come Batman, il PIÙ GRANDE DETECTIVE DEL MONDO, risolvendo puzzle complessi con l’aiuto di strumenti forensi come lo scanner a raggi x, delle impronte digitali, lo spray Amido Black e un rilevatore di feromoni.
    					
  Affronta i più grandi criminali di Gotham inclusi IL JOKER, HARLEY QUINN, POISON IVY E KILLER CROC 
    					
  Diventa il Predatore Invisibile con i KO terrore di Batman e un sistema di punti di vantaggio per muoverti senza farti vedere e dare la caccia ai nemici.  
    					
  Scegli tra vari metodi per i KO, come piombando dal cielo e sfondando i muri. 
    					
  Esplora ogni angolo dell’Arkham Asylum e muoviti liberamente su questa famigerata isola, presentata per la prima volta in tutto il suo crudo realismo.
    					
  Scopri come ci si sente ad essere BATMAN usando i Batarang, il gel aerosol esplosivo, il Bat-artiglio, il risonatore sonar e il Lancia-cavo 
    					
  Sblocca altri segreti completando le sfide segrete, sviluppa e personalizza l’equipaggiamento con i Punti esperienza. 
    					
  Approfitta della libertà completa del supereroe usando il rampino di Batman per lanciarti ovunque, salta da qualunque altezza e plana in tutte le direzioni.
computerspil fra 2009
videogioco del 2009

game.brief:
Batman: Arkham Asylum is an action-adventure game developed by Rocksteady Studios and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. Released in 2009, it follows Batman as he battles the Joker, who seizes control of Arkham Asylum and frees its inmates. The game features stealth, combat, and detective elements, with players using Batman's gadgets and skills to subdue enemies and solve puzzles.

Set in a dark, immersive version of Gotham, the story explores Batman’s psychological battle with his foes, including Harley Quinn, Bane, and Scarecrow. The game received critical acclaim for its gameplay, atmosphere, and storytelling, becoming a defining title in superhero video games.

After the Joker assaults Gotham City Hall, he is caught by Batman and taken to Arkham Asylum, which temporarily houses many members of the Joker's gang, who were transferred after a fire at Blackgate Prison. Believing the Joker allowed himself to be captured, Batman accompanies him into the asylum. The Joker's plan is revealed as Harley Quinn takes control of the security and the Joker escapes into the facility, aided by a corrupt guard who kidnaps Commissioner Gordon. The Joker threatens to detonate bombs hidden around Gotham City if anyone tries to enter Arkham, forcing Batman to work alone. Tracking Quinn to the medical facility to rescue Gordon, Batman is exposed to the Scarecrow's fear toxin and hallucinates, seeing Gordon's death and the corpses of his parents talking to him. After fighting off Scarecrow, Batman finds and subdues Quinn before rescuing Gordon. The Joker then directs Batman to the captured Bane, who has been experimented on by asylum doctor Penelope Young. The Joker frees Bane and Batman is forced to fight him, during which Quinn escapes. Afterward, he goes to a secret Batcave installation he had hidden on the island, where Batman restocks his gadgets.

There, Batman learns that the Joker returned to the asylum to gain access to Young, who has been developing Titan—a more powerful version of the Venom drug that gives Bane his strength—intending to use it to help patients survive more strenuous therapies. Young learned that the Joker had been funding her research to create an army of superhuman henchmen; her refusal to hand over the formula precipitated Joker's return to the Asylum. While searching for Young, Batman is again attacked by Scarecrow and the fear toxin, and hallucinates the night of his parents' deaths. After he recovers, Batman destroys Young's Titan formula and rescues Young from Victor Zsasz. An explosion kills Young and the Joker obtains the completed batches of Titan.

At the Penitentiary, Quinn releases Poison Ivy from her cell before being imprisoned by Batman. Quinn accidentally reveals that Joker has a Titan production facility in the Arkham botanical gardens. Batman travels there and learns that Titan is created by genetically modified plants. He enlists Ivy's help to create an antidote and learns that it can only be made from spores found exclusively in Killer Croc's lair in a sewer. En route to Croc, Batman is again attacked by Scarecrow and overcomes several doses of fear toxin. Meanwhile, Joker injects Ivy with Titan, enhancing her powers. Ivy begins ravaging Arkham Island with giant mutant plants. Pursued by Batman into Croc's lair, Scarecrow is attacked by Croc and dragged underwater. Batman recovers the necessary spores and subdues Croc before returning to the Batcave, but can only synthesize one dose of the antidote before Ivy's plants breach the cave and destroy his equipment.

Batman returns to the botanical gardens and defeats Ivy, halting the rampaging plants. The Joker announces that the preparations for his party are finally complete and Batman travels to the asylum's visitor center where the Joker's applauding henchmen welcome him. The Joker reveals he has recaptured Gordon and tries to shoot him with a Titan-filled dart; Batman leaps to Gordon's defense and is shot instead. Batman attempts to resist the change, and an upset Joker takes an overdose of Titan, mutating into a massive monster. In a makeshift arena on the building's roof, the Joker challenges Batman to a fight as Titan-induced monsters in front of news helicopters. Batman refuses to transform, uses the antidote on himself, and defeats the Titan-affected Joker and his henchmen, knocking his nemesis unconscious with an explosive gel-enhanced punch. In the aftermath, those affected by Titan begin to revert to normal, including the Joker—who is restrained and taken into custody as police officers retake the asylum. Batman overhears a call about a crime led by Two-Face in progress and flies back to Gotham City in the Batwing. In a post-credits scene, a crate of Titan formula is shown floating in the ocean near the asylum when a hand surfaces and grabs it.

game.title: F.I.S.T.: Forged In Shadow Torch
game.description: It is a metroidvania game that the player will play as a rabbit who can manipulate the big mech-arm on his back, exploring in a vivid diesel punk world and fighting against the evil robot army. There will be a vast world map for the player to explore to meet with friend NPCs and encounter enemies, discover items and weapons and seek for the answers for the secrets hidden behind.

game.title: Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course
game.description:
In Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course, Cuphead and Mugman are joined by Ms. Chalice for a DLC add-on adventure on a brand new island! With new weapons, new charms, and Ms. Chalice's brand new abilities, take on a new cast of multi-faceted, screen-filling bosses to assist Chef Saltbaker in Cuphead's final challenging quest.

Brothers Cuphead and Mugman are joined by the clever, adventurous Ms. Chalice for a rollicking adventure on a previously undiscovered Inkwell Isle! With the aid of new weapons, magical charms, and Ms. Chalice’s unique abilities, players will take on a new cast of fearsome, larger than life bosses to assist the jolly Chef Saltbaker in Cuphead’s final challenging quest! For all those with an appetite for adventure, be ready to set sail for D.L.C. Isle when The Delicious Last Course launches on June 30, 2022.

game.title: Divinity: Original Sin II
game.description:
Divinity: Original Sin II is a single- and multiplayer top-down, party-based role-playing game with pen & paper RPG-like levels of freedom. It features turn-based combat, a strong focus on systematic gameplay and a well-grounded narrative.

The Divine is dead. The Void approaches. And the powers lying dormant within you are soon to awaken. The battle for Divinity has begun. Choose wisely and trust sparingly; darkness lurks within every heart.

localized_description.text: Quando não estão a esgotar lotações em estádios, as superestrelas de K-pop Rumi, Mira e Zoey usam os seus poderes secretos para proteger os fãs de ameaças sobrenaturais.

”We’re goin’ up, up, up“ – und jetzt ist DEIN Moment! Hilf mit, den Honmoon zu versiegeln, und sing deine Lieblingssongs mit HUNTR/X und den Saja Boys in dieser Sing-Along-Version des Netflix-Hits in voller Länge.
Cuando no están llenando estadios, las superestrellas del K-pop Rumi, Mira y Zoey usan sus poderes secretos para proteger a sus fans de una amenaza sobrenatural.

movie.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
movie.description: After the insane General Jack D. Ripper initiates a nuclear strike on the Soviet Union, a war room full of politicians, generals and a Russian diplomat all frantically try to stop it.

localized_title.text: Il dottor Stranamore, ovvero: come ho imparato a non preoccuparmi e ad amare la bomba
Dr. Strangelove - eller Hvordan jeg lærte at glemme mine bekymringer og elske bomben
Dr. Seltsam oder: Wie ich lernte, die Bombe zu lieben
Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb

localized_description.text: Uno psicopatico generale dell'aviazione USA, deciso a salvare il mondo dal complotto comunista, è pronto ad attaccare l'Unione Sovietica con armi nucleari. Uno dei pochi capolavori di satira politica nella storia del cinema che riflette gli incubi apocalittici dei primi anni '60. Il più forsennato e meno controllato film di Kubrick con Peter Sellers in 3 ruoli al culmine del suo istrionismo. Non vinse nemmeno uno dei 4 Oscar cui era candidato. Dal romanzo Red Alert (1958) di Peter George che lo sceneggiò con Terry Southern e il regista.

En paranoid general beordrer et atomangreb på Sovjetunionen, fordi han er overbevist om, at kommunisterne har til hensigt at forurene USA's "dyrebare kropsvæsker". Mens generalens adjudant Kaptajn Mandrake fumler med at finde koden for aflysning af angrebet, ringer den amerikanske præsident til den fulde sovjetiske præsident på den røde telefon for at fortælle, at det varslede angreb bare er en misforståelse. Samtidig bekræfter præsidentens rådgiver (en eks-nazistisk videnskabsmand) Dr. Strangelove, at den frygtede dommedagsmaskine eksisterer. Det er en maskine, som Sovjetunionen har udviklet for at gøre en ende på menneskeheden én gang for alle!

Um general norte-americano louco, Jack D. Ripper, obcecado pelo medo de que os comunistas estejam a sabotar as reservas de água potável dos EUA, resolve lançar vários bombardeiros com armas nucleares contra a Rússia, num ataque sem ordens nem provocação prévia. Informado do incidente, o presidente dos EUA reúne-se no Pentágono com os seus generais e comandantes para evitar o pior, descobrindo que os russos também não têm o controlo completo dos acontecimentos, e que pode ser já tarde demais para evitar o holocausto nuclear.

Ein geisteskranker amerikanischer General, Jack D. Ripper, fühlt sich durch die kommunistische Weltverschwörung mehr und mehr bedroht. Eines Tages dreht er völlig durch. Er setzt die amerikanische Atombombenflotte Richtung Sowjetunion in Marsch. Weil der General das Geheimnis des Rückruf-Codes schließlich mit ins Grab nimmt, ist der amerikanische Präsident Muffley gezwungen, dem Sowjetpremier am Roten Telefon alle Einzelheiten über die anschwebenden Todesbomber zu verraten. Die rote Abwehr kann alle Bomber abschießen – bis auf einen!

Le général Jack Ripper, convaincu que les Russes ont décidé d'empoisonner l'eau potable des États-Unis, lance sur l'URSS une offensive de bombardiers B-52 en ayant pris soin d'isoler la base aérienne de Burpelson du reste du monde. Pendant ce temps, Muffley, le Président des États-Unis, convoque l'état-major militaire dans la salle d'opérations du Pentagone et tente de rétablir la situation.

Convencido de que los comunistas están contaminando los Estados Unidos, un general ordena, en un acceso de locura, un ataque aéreo nuclear sorpresa contra la Unión Soviética. Su ayudante, el capitán Mandrake, trata de encontrar la fórmula para impedir el bombardeo. Por su parte, el presidente de los EE.UU. se pone en contacto con Moscú para convencer al gobierno soviético de que el ataque no es más que un estúpido error. Mientras tanto, el asesor estadounidense, un antiguo científico nazi, el doctor Strangelove, confirma la existencia de la «Máquina del Juicio Final», un dispositivo de represalia soviético capaz de acabar con la humanidad para siempre.
After the insane General Jack D. Ripper initiates a nuclear strike on the Soviet Union, a war room full of politicians, generals and a Russian diplomat all frantically try to stop it.

localized_description.text: Coriolanus Snow ejerce de mentor y desarrolla sentimientos hacia la tributo femenina del Distrito 12 durante los X Juegos del Hambre.
Coriolanus Snow est le mentor d'une jeune fille du District 12 et développe des sentiments pour elle pendant les 10e Hunger Games.
Coriolanus Snow mentors and develops feelings for the female District 12 tribute during the 10th Hunger Games.

Vorgeschichte um den jungen Coriolanus Snow, der als Mentor bei den 10. Hungerspielen zwischen dem weiblichen Tribut aus Bezirk 12 und seiner Stellung in der Gesellschaft hin- und hergerissen ist und im Zuge dessen die Spiele neu gestaltet
Coriolanus Snow sviluppa sentimenti per il tributo femminile del Distretto 12 durante la decima edizione degli Hunger Games.

Anos antes de se tornar o tirânico Presidente de Panem, Coriolanus Snow, aos 18 anos, vê uma chance de mudança de sorte quando é escolhido para ser mentor de Lucy Gray Baird, uma garota tributo do empobrecido Distrito 12.
2023 film directed by Francis Lawrence
película de 2023 dirigida por Francis Lawrence
film américain de science-fiction réalisé par Francis Lawrence
Film von Francis Lawrence (2023)
film del 2023 diretto da Francis Lawrence

為了讓施惠國的公民記取戰爭教訓而舉辦的飢餓遊戲, 即將迎來第十屆。不僅被抽中的貢品要以孤注一擲的決心贏得比賽, 連出身都城世家的學生也將擔任導師, 與他們的貢品合作, 贏得比賽、獲得榮耀, 以及遠大前程。18歲尚未當上施惠國總統的科利奧蘭納斯史諾, 期待成為最有競爭力的貢品的導師。史諾家族曾經輝煌, 但在戰後家道中落。如今房子的稅金、家人的命運取決於史諾能否比他的同學更聰穎、更有謀略, 指導貢品贏得飢餓遊戲。然而局劫一開始就對史諾非常不利, 他被分配到的貢品, 是來自施惠國最窮困的第十二區的瘦弱女孩 – 露西葛蕾。她身穿彩虹裙, 帶著一條蛇參加抽籤典禮, 在眾人面前放蛇咬人….在競技場裡, 眼看有一場生死決鬥, 史諾所的每一個抉擇都可能露西葛蕾走向勝利或毁滅。沒有退路, 他們倆的命運完全糾纏在一起, 他開始同心青他那個在劫難逃的貢品….他必須衡量自己的需求、遵循遊戲的則、抗拒內心的欲望, 無論付出何等代價都要讓他們倆活下去。
8 歲的史諾（湯姆布萊斯 飾）將擔任第十屆飢餓遊戲的導師，期待能透過指導貢品贏得比賽，振興落魄的家族，不料他抽中的貢品是一名來自施惠國最窮困十二區的個性古怪女孩露西（瑞秋曾格勒 飾），兩人最後能夠順利在飢餓遊戲中勝出嗎？
18岁的科里奥兰纳斯·斯诺被选为第十届饥饿游戏的导师，与来自第十二区的贫困女孩露西·格雷·贝尔德成为了“生死相依”的命运共同体。竞技场上，这是一场关乎自由、食物，甚至是尊重与权利的生死角逐；竞技场外，不忍与善意使斯诺决定不顾一切帮助露西在这场游戏中赢得胜利......当活下去的欲望与所遵守的规则背道而驰，命运的齿轮紧抓入自己手中时，他又该如何抉择？
64 years before he becomes the tyrannical president of Panem, Coriolanus Snow sees a chance for a change in fortunes when he mentors Lucy Gray Baird, the female tribute from District 12.

movie.brief: Coriolanus Snow mentors and develops feelings for the female District 12 tribute during the 10th Hunger Games.

movie.title: Joker
movie.description: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

localized_description.text: Arthur Fleck vive con l'anziana madre in un palazzone fatiscente e sbarca il lunario facendo pubblicità per la strada travestito da clown, in attesa di avere il giusto materiale per realizzare il desiderio di fare il comico. La sua vita, però, è una tragedia: ignorato, calpestato, bullizzato, preso in giro da da chiunque, ha sviluppato un tic nervoso che lo fa ridere a sproposito incontrollabilmente, rendendolo inquietante e allontanando ulteriormente da lui ogni possibile relazione sociale. Ma un giorno Arthur non ce la fa più e reagisce violentemente, pistola alla mano. Mentre la polizia di Gotham City dà la caccia al clown killer, la popolazione lo elegge a eroe metropolitano, simbolo della rivolta degli oppressi contro l'arroganza dei ricchi.

Arthur Fleck kæmper for at finde sin plads i mængden. I den fjendtlige by Gotham, der emmer af splittelse, går han rundt i de mørke gader iført to forskellige masker. Den maske, han dagligt maler på i sit job som klovn, og den anden han aldrig kan tage af. Den er hans forklædning - hans meningsløse forsøg på at passe ind i samfundet i stedet for at være den mand, der gang på gang skuffes af livet. Arthur er faderløs, og hans skrøbelige mor er hans bedste ven. Hun gav ham kælenavnet Happy. Et navn, der fremmaner hans smil og skjuler smerten indeni. Men da han bliver mobbet af teenagere på gaden, hånet af forretningsmænd i metroen og drillet af hans klovnekollegaer, bringes den udstødte mand kun endnu mere ude af synk med alle omkring ham.

Arthur Fleck é um homem que enfrenta a crueldade e o desprezo da sociedade, juntamente com a indiferença de um sistema que lhe permite passar da vulnerabilidade para a depravação. Durante o dia é um palhaço e à noite luta para se tornar um artista de stand-up comedy…mas descobre que é ele próprio a piada. Sempre diferente de todos em seu redor, o seu riso incontrolável e inapropriado, ganha ainda mais força quando tenta contê-lo, expondo-o a situações ridículas e até à violência. Preso numa existência cíclica que oscila entre o precipício da realidade e da loucura, uma má decisão acarreta uma reacção em cadeia de eventos crescentes e, por fim, mortais.

Gotham City im Jahr 1981: Der mental instabile Arthur Fleck führt wahrlich nicht das Leben, von dem man träumt: Vollgepumpt mit Medikamenten geht er seiner Arbeit als kostümierter Werbeschildträger nach und wird nicht selten das Ziel von Spott und Attacken. Abends zieht es ihn in sein heruntergekommenes Apartment, wo er sich um seine kranke Mutter kümmern muss. Gemeinsam hoffen sie auf ein besseres Leben, das Arthur als Stand-Up-Komiker realisieren will. Als plötzlich die Förderung für seine psychologische Betreuung gestrichen wird, nimmt das Unheil seinen Lauf. Die Schusswaffe eines Kollegen, die Suche nach seinem echten Vater und plötzlicher Ruhm sorgen dafür, dass der einstmals harmlose Exzentriker die ganze Stadt in Angst und Schrecken versetzt …
Dans les années 1980, à Gotham City, Arthur Fleck, un humoriste de stand‐up raté, bascule dans la folie et devient le Joker.

Arthur Fleck es un hombre ignorado por la sociedad, cuya motivación en la vida es hacer reír. Pero una serie de trágicos acontecimientos le llevarán a ver el mundo de otra forma. Película basada en Joker, el popular personaje de DC Comics y archivillano de Batman, pero que en este film toma un cariz más realista y oscuro.
During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

Isolado, intimidado e desconsiderado pela sociedade, o fracassado comediante Arthur Fleck inicia seu caminho como uma mente criminosa após assassinar três homens em pleno metrô. Sua ação inicia um movimento popular contra a elite de Gotham City, da qual Thomas Wayne é seu maior representante.
亚瑟·弗兰克是一个依靠扮演小丑赚取营生的普通人，患有精神疾病的他和母亲一同住在哥谭市的一座公寓里，幻想成为脱口秀演员的亚瑟为了这个目标而努力的生活着，但是现实却屡次击败他的梦想，亚瑟渐渐地变得越来越癫狂，某天在地铁上，亚瑟为了自保杀害了几名嘲笑他的人，同时，一个疯狂的想法在亚瑟心灵萌发……  在看似和平的哥谭市，即将发生翻天覆地的巨变。

홀어머니와 사는 아서 플렉은 코미디언을 꿈꾸지만 그의 삶은 좌절과 절망으로 가득 차 있다. 광대 아르바이트는 그에게 모욕을 가져다주기 일쑤고, 긴장하면 웃음을 통제할 수 없는 신경병 증세는 그를 더욱 고립시킨다. 정부 예산 긴축으로 인해 정신과 약물을 지원하던 공공의료 서비스마저 없어져 버린 어느 날, 아서는 지하철에서 시비를 걸어온 증권사 직원들에게 얻어맞던 와중에 동료가 건네준 권총으로 그들을 쏴 버리고 만다. 군중들은 지배계급에 대한 저항의 아이콘이 된 그를 추종하기 시작하며 광대 마스크로 얼굴을 가리고 거리로 쏟아져 나오기 시작하는데...
1981年、犯罪が多発する大都会ゴッサムシティ。ピエロの仕事をしているアーサーは貧しく、老いた母親ペニーと暮らす上、突然笑いだしてしまうという心の病に悩むが、TV界の人気司会者フランクリンを憧れの対象にして日々耐え忍んでいた。ある日、失業したアーサーは地下鉄で、女性客に嫌がらせをしていた男性3人組を偶然持っていた拳銃で皆殺しにしてしまう。以後アーサーは、自身の心にあった怒りを解放させていく。
導演杜德菲力斯執導的《小丑》是這個經典反派在大銀幕上前所未見的原創獨立電影。杜德菲力斯鏡頭下的Arthur Fleck(華堅馮力士 飾)在葛咸城掙扎求存。他是個出租小丑，渴望能夠成為棟篤笑匠，卻發現自己的人生更像個笑話。Arthur受盡社會的冷漠和殘酷所折磨，作出一個醜惡的決定，引發出一連串無可挽回的事件。
亞瑟·弗蘭克是一名以小丑職業為生的普通人，患有精神疾病的他和母親一同住在哥譚市的一座公寓裡。幻想成為脫口秀演員的亞瑟為了這個目標而努力的生活著，但是現實卻屢次擊敗他的夢想，亞瑟漸漸地變得越來越癲狂。某天在地鐵上，亞瑟為了自保殺害了幾名嘲笑他的人；同時，一個瘋狂的想法在亞瑟心靈萌發……  在看似和平的哥譚市，即將發生翻天覆地的巨變。

湿冷无望的哥谭市，卑微的亚瑟·弗兰克（华金·菲尼克斯 Joaquin Phoenix 饰）依靠扮演小丑赚取营生。与之相依为命的母亲患有精神疾病，而亚瑟深记母亲的教诲，无论遭受怎样的挫折都笑对人生，却因此让自己背负着莫大的压力，濒临崩溃。他梦想成为一名脱口秀演员，怎奈生活一次次将失望狠狠地砸在他的头上。不仅如此，他因意外丢掉了工作，偶然瞥见母亲的秘密，又使他心中燃起对那个与之地位悬殊却从未谋面的父亲的殷切渴望。命运习惯了事与愿违，空荡荡的地铁内，悲伤的小丑在无法自已的癫狂笑声中大开杀戒……
本片荣获第76届威尼斯电影节金狮奖。

movie.title: Iron Man
movie.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

localized_description.text: Anthony Stark è un inventore geniale e miliardario col vizio delle donne (tante) e delle attività filantropiche. Ereditato patrimonio e ingegno dal padre scomparso in un incidente d'auto, Tony (per amici e amichette) conduce e amministra le Industrie Stark, produttrici e prime fornitrici di armi per il governo americano. Durante un test in medioriente, per verificare l'efficienza di un'arma sperimentale, viene catturato da un gruppo di estremisti. Ferito al cuore da una scheggia è soccorso e curato da Yinsen, un fisico esperto di cibernetica che gli applica un organo artificiale. Obbligato dai guerriglieri a costruire un'arma invincibile per la loro causa, Tony progetta in segreto un'armatura per fuggire alla prigionia. Rientrato negli Stati Uniti è deciso a cambiare vita, a riparare alle ingiustizie e a "industriarsi" a favore dei più deboli. Perfezionata l'armatura con la tecnologia avanzata diventa Iron Man, un (super)eroe "umano, troppo umano".

Da den geniale jetset-industrimagnat, Tony Stark, tages til fange bag fjendens linjer, bygger han en højteknologisk beskyttelsesdragt, som skal hjælpe ham med at flygte. Nu er han taget ud på en mission for at redde verden som en helt, der er bygget – ikke født – til at være som ingen anden
Depois de sobreviver um ataque inesperado em território inimigo, o genial industrial da aeronáutica Tony Stark constrói uma armadura “high tech” e promete proteger o mundo enquanto Homem de Ferro.

Der Großindustrielle und Erfinder Tony Stark weiß zu leben: Als Milliardär liegen ihm die Frauen zu Füßen, er feiert Partys im Privatjet und verspielt Riesensummen im Casino, während seine Rüstungsfirma unter Obadiah Stane Rekordumsätze erzielt. Bei einem Waffentestlauf in Afghanistan wird er jedoch Opfer eines Bombenanschlags. Stark überlebt schwer verletzt und wird von einer Gruppe Aufständischer unter Führung des Warlords Raza dazu gezwungen, eine Superwaffe zu entwickeln. Es gelingt ihm jedoch, heimlich eine eiserne Schutzrüstung zu bauen, die ihn dank neuster Technologie zu Superkräften befähigt. Nach einer spektakulären Flucht zurück in die USA muss sich der Iron Man allerdings einem ersten übermächtigen Gegner stellen.

Tony Stark, inventeur de génie, vendeur d'armes et playboy milliardaire, est kidnappé. Forcé par ses ravisseurs de fabriquer une arme redoutable, il construit en secret une armure high-tech révolutionnaire qu'il utilise pour s'échapper. Comprenant la puissance de cette armure, il décide de l'améliorer et de l'utiliser pour faire régner la justice et protéger les innocents.

El multimillonario fabricante de armas Tony Stark debe enfrentarse a su turbio pasado después de sufrir un accidente con una de sus armas. Equipado con una armadura de última generación tecnológica, se convierte en 'El hombre de hierro' para combatir el mal a escala global.
After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

movie.title: Oppenheimer
movie.description: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

localized_description.text: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

En 1942, convaincus que l'Allemagne nazie est en train de développer une arme nucléaire, les États-Unis initient, dans le plus grand secret, le "Projet Manhattan" destiné à mettre au point la première bombe atomique de l’histoire. Pour piloter ce dispositif, le gouvernement engage J. Robert Oppenheimer, brillant physicien, qui sera bientôt surnommé "le père de la bombe atomique". C'est dans le laboratoire ultra-secret de Los Alamos, au cœur du désert du Nouveau-Mexique, que le scientifique et son équipe mettent au point une arme révolutionnaire dont les conséquences, vertigineuses, continuent de peser sur le monde actuel…
Beretningen om den amerikanske videnskabsmand J. Robert Oppenheimer og hans rolle i udviklingen af atombomben.

La storia del ruolo di J. Robert Oppenheimer, i quali studi condussero alle scoperte legate alla bomba atomica, con il conseguente utilizzo durante le stragi di Hiroshima e Nagasaki durante la Seconda Guerra Mondiale.
O físico J. Robert Oppenheimer trabalha com uma equipa de cientistas durante o Projeto Manhattan, levando ao desenvolvimento da bomba atómica.

Als dem Physiker Julius Robert Oppenheimer während des Zweiten Weltkriegs die wissenschaftliche Leitung des Manhattan-Projekts übertragen wird, können er und seine Ehefrau Kitty sich nicht vorstellen, welche Auswirkungen Oppenheimers Arbeit nicht nur auf ihr Leben, sondern auf die ganze Welt haben wird. Im Los Alamos National Laboratory in New Mexico sollen er und sein Team unter der Aufsicht von Lt. Leslie Groves eine Nuklearwaffe entwickeln – was ihnen auch gelingt. Oppenheimer wird zum „Vater der Atombombe“ ausgerufen, doch dass seine tödliche Erfindung bald folgenschwer in Hiroshima und Nagasaki eingesetzt wird, lässt Oppenheimer Abstand von dem Projekt nehmen. Als der Krieg zu Ende geht, setzt sich Robert Oppenheimer als Berater der US-amerikanischen Atomenergiebehörde, die von Lewis Strauss mitbegründet wurde, für eine internationale Kontrolle von Kernenergie und gegen ein nukleares Wettrüsten ein – und gerät ins Visier des FBI.

Película sobre el físico J. Robert Oppenheimer y su papel como desarrollador de la bomba atómica. Basada en el libro 'American Prometheus: The Triumph and Tragedy of J. Robert Oppenheimer' de Kai Bird y Martin J. Sherwin.
The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer's role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.

A história do físico americano J. Robert Oppenheimer, seu papel no Projeto Manhattan e no desenvolvimento da bomba atômica durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, e o quanto isso mudaria a história do mundo para sempre.

当我们为权力金钱焦虑、兴奋与愤怒时，却根本想象不到“他们”在谈论着怎样更重要的事情。
随着战争阴云笼罩世界上空，各国紧锣密鼓抓紧军事竞赛。为了抢占先机，美国陆军中将莱斯利·格罗夫斯（马特·达蒙 Matt Damon 饰）找到量子力学与核物理学领域的扛鼎人物罗伯特·奥本海默（基里安·墨菲 Cillian Murphy 饰），力荐其担任曼哈顿计划的首席科学家以及洛斯阿拉莫斯国家实验室的总负责人。经过两年争分夺秒的研发，硕大的蘑菇云终于在荒原的上空腾起，也宣告着绞肉机一般的二战即将落下帷幕。奥本海默有如将火种带到人间的普罗米修斯，可是对人性的参悟和对未来的担忧迫使他走向与政府相悖的道路。更可悲的是，凡人钟情的物欲也将一世天才裹挟至炼狱之中，永世燃烧……
克里斯托弗·诺兰自编自导新片《奥本海默》，聚焦基里安·墨菲饰演的“原子弹之父”罗伯特·奥本海默。改编自凯·伯德和马丁·J·舍温所著罗伯特·奥本海默传记《美国普罗米修斯：罗伯特·奥本海默的胜利与悲剧》，该书曾获2005年普利策传记文学奖。

film américain prévu en 2025
